content: I'll now turn the call over to J.J. Q2 2022 sales were $42.1 million, an increase of 4% on a reported basis and 8% organically versus Q2 2021. Turning to guidance, we expect Q3 2022 sales of $39 million to $41 million, which represents a reported increase of 4% at the midpoint and 10% organically. For the full-year of 2022, we are increasing our sales guidance to $162.7 million to $165.3 million, which represents an increase of 6% at the midpoint and 10% organically. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. One moment please for our next question. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. One moment please for our next question. Your line is now open. One moment please for our next question. Your line is now open. One moment please for our next question. Your line is now open. Your line is now open.
